text: Bruce Wolfe's bronze statue of Barbara Jordan at the Austin–Bergstrom International Airport in Austin, Texas, was erected in 2002. ==See also== * 2002 in art ==References== Category:2002 establishments in Texas Category:2002 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Texas Category:Monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Sculptures of women in Texas Category:Statues in Texas Category:Austin–Bergstrom International Airport
title: Statue of Barbara Jordan (Austin–Bergstrom International Airport)
